title: Shawshank Redemption
description: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

title: Jumper
description: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

title: Ocean's Eleven
description: Less than 24 hours into his parole, charismatic thief Danny Ocean is already rolling out his next plan: In one night, Danny's hand-picked crew of specialists will attempt to steal more than $150 million from three Las Vegas casinos.
